content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to Google language learning resources and travel destinations. The command returned a list of URLs with language learning and travel tips. I then used the command "get_text_summary" on one of the URLs, but it returned an error message saying that it was missing a required positional argument. Later, I received a command to get the text summary of a different URL, which mentioned a list of 120 most-used Bulgarian travel phrases with pronunciation, language learning apps and resources, travel tips, and destinations. It did not highlight any specific language learning resources or travel destinations as the most important. \n\nI received a new command to get the text summary of a website that provides guides and tutorials for learning various languages including Spanish, Dutch, and Papiamento. It also offers resources and books to help with language learning. The website focuses on travel destinations, particularly in Ecuador, Africa, and Nova Scotia, and provides information on attractions, animals, and foods from around the world. Therefore, the most important language learning resources are Spanish, Dutch, and Papiamento, and the most important travel destinations are Ecuador, Africa, and Nova Scotia. \n\nI then generated an image with the top language learning resources and travel destinations. The image was saved to disk.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/safaris/africa-safari-best-places-to-go", "question": "What are the top attractions and activities to do in Africa?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on the top attractions and activities to do in Africa. It is a website for Travel + Leisure magazine that provides travel guides, tips, and news related to travel. It also offers information on hotels, resorts, airlines, and cruises. The website has a search option and menu to help users find the information they need. The text also mentions the use of cookies to personalize the user experience. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/safaris/africa-safari-best-places-to-go#main)', '\\n\\nTravel + Leisure\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://www.travelandleisure.com/)', ' Subscribe\\n (https://www.magazines.com/travel-leisure-magazine.html?utm_source=travelandleisure.com&utm_medium=owned&utm_campaign=i111tlr1w2665)', ' Manage Your Subscription\\n (https://w1.buysub.com/servlet/CSGateway?cds_mag_code=TAL)', ' Give a Gift Subscription\\n (https://www.magazines.com/travel-leisure-magazine.html)']"}]
"""
